## Who we are

**CORMUFAVE** is the Corporation Women and Family 'El Vergel'.

We work for the well-being of the community of San Antonio de Prado, a rural area of Medellín, Colombia.

![](images/bienvenida.png){width="70%" fig-align="center"}
